author: [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/)
title: Pictures Quality

comments.body:
I guess image quality is dependent on the download feed. One possible solution might be to add an import option that lets you overwrite downloaded image with one obtained outside of Magarena.

**Status:** Accepted  
  **Labels:** Component-UI
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body:
Issue 626 should help towards addressing this.

**Status:** Duplicate  
  **Owner:** lodici123  
  **Mergedinto:** 626
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
